entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a boy who is being kept locked in his room by the Dursleys.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: A house-elf who had previously saved Harry from horrible happenings at Hogwarts.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: A school for magic where Harry is a student.

entities.name: privet drive
entities.description: The address of the Dursleys' house where Harry is being kept locked in his room.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: Harry's cruel and neglectful relatives who are keeping him locked in his room.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: One of Harry's aunts, who is shown to be cruel and neglectful towards him.

relationships.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts school for magic.
Dobby had previously saved Harry from horrible happenings at Hogwarts.
Hogwarts might expel Harry if he uses magic to escape his room.
The Dursleys are keeping Harry locked in his room.
Aunt Petunia is providing food for Harry, but also showing cruelty towards him.
